config.sql: SELECT b.admin AS country_name, a.iso AS country_iso, a.incidence AS value, b.the_geom_webmercator FROM crm_globocan_2012 a, crm_countries_geoms b WHERE a.iso = b.adm0_a3 ORDER BY b.admin
config.cartocss: /** choropleth visualization */ #crm_globocan_2012 { polygon-fill: transparent; polygon-opacity: 0.8; line-color: #FFF; line-width: 1; line-opacity: 1; } #crm_globocan_2012 [ value > 242.9] { polygon-fill: #CD0000; } #crm_globocan_2012 [ value <= 242.9] { polygon-fill: #D84948; } #crm_globocan_2012 [ value <= 172.3] { polygon-fill: #E18683; } #crm_globocan_2012 [ value <= 137.5] { polygon-fill: #E8B7B3; } #crm_globocan_2012 [ value <= 101.3] { polygon-fill: #E9C0BC; }
